Background and Bio:

I recently graduated from the University of Richmond, suma cum laude, with a double major in Business Administration and Latin American and Iberian Studies. Currently, I am enrolled in the the Sales and Business Development Track at the Boston Startup School to fine tune my sales, negotiation, and closing skills. In my professional experience, I have developed an interest in strategic development, market research, customer acquisition, and business development.

I am passionate about the tech startup world and am seeking a mentor and work culture to help guide me in both my professional and personal development. My ultimte goal is to work with a highly motivated, intelligent group of people determined to change the world by taking a small dream and transforming it into a big reality.
